content: skill level **experienced** this pattern was originally published in the tahki stacy charles crochet 2007 booklet worked with tahki yarns bali and a size j hook it was reworked for ny yarns and republished finished measurements bust 35 40 45 50 /89 101 5 114 5 127 cm length 19 20 1⁄2 22 22 /48 5 52 56 56 cm if you would like to receive previews of new collections and free patterns throughout the season please subscribe 1 to our newsletters 1 http //tahkistacycharles com/newsletter-archive/
